description.fits_on: Equipment vest, belt, leg plate or leg attachment
description.features_intro: This telescopic baton holster can be attached to our equipment belt or equipment vest vertically or horizontally. It can also be carried concealed on your trouser belt.
features: Large opening in the top to make it easy to insert the baton after use.
Flap, that can be removed to secure the baton.
The bottom has an opening so an extended baton can be inserted. The opening can be closed with a flap with press button.
Fold back attachment system makes it possible to attach the pouch on any equipment vest or belt.
